content: **marble socks summer edition** are worked from the cuff to the toe the cuff is knitted with twisted rib except for the lace pattern on the top the socks are knitted in stockinette stitch the heels are knitted with heel flaps the toes are grafted top to bottom using kitchener stitch you find good tutorials on youtube for kitchener stitch **sizes ** eu shoe sizes women 35-36 37-38 39-40 us shoe sizes women 5-6 6 5-7 5 8 5-9 5 **needles ** double pointed needles 2 25 mm us1 **gauge ** 32 sts x 42 row= 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 inches **materials ** 50 55 60 g moods of color s softsock 100 g= 425 m 464 yds or 50 50 60 g selma by permin 50 g = 210 m 229 yds **techniques ** the pattern contains a very easy lace pattern worked over 6 row and it will be easy to knit even if you are a beginner **you find me as ainavdesign on** instagram facebook youtube
